The Sawyer Mini is an excellent choice for a water filter. It's a popular option among backpackers and outdoor enthusiasts due to its lightweight, compact design, and high effectiveness in removing bacteria, viruses, and parasites from water.

The Sawyer Mini is also very easy to use and maintain, and it's a great value for its price. It's a great option for anyone who wants a reliable and portable water filtration system.

Remember to always follow the manufacturer's instructions for use and maintenance to ensure the effectiveness of your water filter. It's also a good idea to bring a backup method of water purification, such as water purification tablets, in case your filter becomes clogged or damaged.

I'm glad I could help with your gear planning! If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Have a great trip and safe travels!
